item.title: 在 "充满挑战 "的市场环境下，GrainCorp 全年净利润低于预期
item.description: 澳大利亚商品出口商谷物公司（GrainCorp Ltd.）的全年盈利大幅低于预期，该公司指出，在全球供应过剩和需求疲软的情况下，市场 "充满挑战"。【原文：Australian commodities exporter GrainCorp Ltd. significantly missed estimates for full-year earnings, with the company pointing to a “challenging” market amid a global supply glut and weak demand.】

item.title: 阿根廷向国际货币基金组织增资 8.7 亿美元指向美国援助
item.description: 上个月，阿根廷在国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）的持股跃升，与美国政府资产的下降幅度相同，因为来自该贷款机构的数据可能表明，美国将向哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）政府提供新形式的金融援助。【原文：Argentina’s holdings at the International Monetary Fund jumped last month by the same amount that the US government’s assets declined, as data from the lender could indicate a new form of US financial aid to Javier Milei’s government.】

item.title: 巴西银行因预期贷款损失而下调利润预期
item.description: 由于第三季度信贷成本增长速度超过预期，巴西银行（Banco do Brasil SA）缩减了今年的利润预期。【原文：Banco do Brasil SA has pared back its profit estimates for this year as credit costs increased at a faster-than-expected pace in the third quarter.】

item.title: CD&R 探索收购包装公司 Sealed Air
item.description: 知情人士透露，Clayton Dubilier & Rice 正在探索收购希悦尔公司（Sealed Air Corp.【原文：Clayton Dubilier & Rice is exploring a potential acquisition of Sealed Air Corp., the packaging company that invented Bubble Wrap, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 亚洲交易员态度谨慎，数据空白令前景蒙上阴影：市场综述
item.description: 在华尔街摇摆不定之后，周四亚洲股市可能难以找到方向，因为投资者在获得关键经济数据有限的情况下权衡美联储的政策前景。【原文：Asian stocks may struggle for direction on Thursday after Wall Street wavered, as investors weighed the Federal Reserve’s policy outlook amid limited access to key economic data.】

item.title: 民主党人找到了名为 "可负担性 "的有力政治武器
item.description:
在本周的《特朗普经济学》 中，我们将讨论党如何利用唐纳德-特朗普的竞选主题来对抗他，从而横扫非年度选举。【原文：

On this week’s Trumponomics, we discuss how the party swept off-year elections by using Donald Trump’s campaign theme against him.

】

item.title: 韩国芯片巨头的唯一 "卖出 "分析师警告人工智能过盛
item.description: 一位对 SK Hynix Inc. 和三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd.）均给予卖出评级的分析师表示，韩国芯片股的估值已达到难以自圆其说的水平，使其很容易因轻微挫折而大幅下跌。【原文：South Korean chip stocks have reached levels where valuations are difficult to justify, leaving them vulnerable to sharp declines on minor setbacks, according to an analyst with sell ratings on both SK Hynix Inc. and Samsung Electronics Co.】

item.title: Khazanah 旗下公司将利用大量土地为数据中心供电
item.description: 马来西亚主权财富基金卡扎纳国民有限公司（Khazanah Nasional Bhd.）的基础设施部门UEM集团（UEM Group Bhd.）董事总经理阿姆兰-哈菲兹-阿菲福丁（Amran Hafiz Affifudin）表示，该公司计划利用其持有的大量土地提供清洁能源和工业用地，以满足柔佛州南部耗电量大的数据中心的需求。【原文：Malaysian sovereign wealth fund Khazanah Nasional Bhd.’s infrastructure arm UEM Group Bhd. plans to use its vast land holdings to supply clean energy and industrial land to accommodate power-hungry data centers in the southern state of Johor, said Managing Director Amran Hafiz Affifudin.】

item.title: 苏格兰首次获得信用评级，为债券销售铺平道路
item.description: 苏格兰首次获得信用评级，这是苏格兰在英国财政困难时期为吸引投资者而首次出售债券的关键一步。【原文：Scotland was assigned its first credit ratings, a critical step on the country’s road to a debut bond sale as it seeks to attract investors during a torrid time for the UK’s finances.】

item.title: 美国只剩最后几分钱了
item.description: 美国只剩最后几分钱了。【原文：The US is down to its last few pennies.】

item.title: 微软将利用 OpenAI 的定制芯片工作帮助内部努力
item.description: 微软公司计划利用 OpenAI 开发定制人工智能半导体的机会，帮助自己的芯片研发工作。【原文：Microsoft Corp. plans to use access to OpenAI’s development of custom AI semiconductors to help its own chip effort.】

item.title: 随着预测市场的发展，Polymarket 以测试版模式在美国重新开放
item.description: Polymarket 已开始对其美国交易所进行现场测试，在按计划重新启动美国博彩市场之前，悄然向部分用户开放并匹配交易。【原文：Polymarket has begun live testing its US exchange by quietly opening up to some users and matching trades ahead of its planned relaunch in the American betting market.】

item.title: 在特朗普矿产政策推动下，皮尔巴拉对美国锂矿企业持开放态度
item.description: 皮尔巴拉矿业有限公司（Pilbara Minerals Ltd.）高层表示，该公司对加入美国锂加工合伙企业持开放态度，该合伙企业将以该公司在澳大利亚或巴西的矿山为原料。【原文：Pilbara Minerals Ltd. is open to joining a US lithium-processing partnership that would be fed by the company’s mines in Australia or Brazil, its top executive said.】

item.title: 人工智能的囚徒困境
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: Fiserv 首席执行官拒绝接受创纪录股价下跌后的会计担忧
item.description: Fiserv Inc.首席执行官迈克-里昂斯（Mike Lyons）将一系列运营缺陷归咎于收益令人失望，这引发了这家支付巨头上个月创纪录的股价暴跌，他拒绝接受关于会计问题在该公司最近的困境中扮演了任何角色的猜测。【原文：Fiserv Inc. Chief Executive Officer Mike Lyons blamed a raft of operational shortcomings for the earnings disappointment that triggered a record rout in the payments giant’s stock last month, rejecting speculation that accounting issues played any role in the company’s recent woes.】

item.title: 思科发布乐观的收入预测，预示人工智能将带来丰厚回报
item.description: 思科系统公司（Cisco Systems Inc.【原文：Cisco Systems Inc., the largest maker of machines that run computer networks and the internet, gave an upbeat sales forecast, showing progress in its effort to capture more artificial intelligence spending.】

item.title: FanDuel 将推出预测市场应用程序以抵御竞争对手
item.description: Flutter Entertainment Plc 的美国在线博彩部门 FanDuel 正在推出自己的预测市场产品，这将使其能够在传统体育博彩非法的州打开市场，并应对来自该领域新创交易所的竞争压力。【原文：FanDuel, the US online gambling division of Flutter Entertainment Plc, is launching its own prediction market product, which will allow it to open up in states where traditional sports betting is illegal and deal with competitive pressure from new startup exchanges in the space.】

item.title: 英国与南方共同市场准备在关税混乱中启动贸易谈判
item.description: 英国和几个南美国家正准备启动贸易谈判，因为不断上涨的关税扰乱了全球商业，并促使各国将其经济伙伴关系多样化。【原文：The UK and several South American nations are preparing to launch trade talks as rising tariffs disrupt global commerce and push countries to diversify their economic partnerships.】

item.title: MUFG 资产管理公司首只 CLO 基金瞄准日本买家
item.description: 三菱日联资产管理公司（Mitsubishi UFJ Asset Management Co.【原文：Mitsubishi UFJ Asset Management Co. will launch its first fund comprising collateralized loan obligations, heeding the government’s call on finance firms to offer products that boost returns for Japanese investors.】

item.title: 美联储主席柯林斯赞成保持利率稳定以抑制通胀
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行行长苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）表示，她赞成在经济增长依然强劲的情况下保持利率稳定，因为这可能会减缓或阻碍通胀降温的进程。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Boston President Susan Collins said she favored holding interest rates steady amid still-strong growth that could slow or stall progress on cooling inflation.】

item.title: 美联储主席珀利称美联储不久将开始购买资产
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行的罗伯托-佩里（Roberto Perli）表示，隔夜融资成本的上升表明银行储备不再充裕，美国央行 "不必等待太久 "就会购买资产以维持理想的流动性水平。【原文：Rising overnight funding costs are signaling that bank reserves are no longer abundant, and the US central bank “won’t have to wait long” before purchasing assets to sustain desired liquidity levels, according to the Federal Reserve Bank of New York’s Roberto Perli.】

item.title: 芝加哥银行家希望通过抛售美国国债来对抗特朗普
item.description: 芝加哥财长 Melissa Conyears-Ervin 周三提议该市停止投资美国国债，以抗议唐纳德-特朗普总统加大移民执法力度和部署军队，招致一些同事的批评，称该计划 "鲁莽"。【原文：Chicago Treasurer Melissa Conyears-Ervin on Wednesday proposed the city stop investing in US Treasuries to protest President Donald Trump’s increased immigration enforcement and deployment of troops, drawing criticism from some colleagues who called the plan “reckless.”】

item.title: 前经纪人承认内幕交易计划源于大流行病
item.description: 斯巴达资本证券公司（Spartan Capital Securities）的一名前经纪人承认，在大流行病期间，他的一位朋友从他女朋友的电脑中窃取了敏感的合并信息，并据此进行了内幕交易。【原文：A former Spartan Capital Securities broker admitted to insider trading based upon sensitive merger information stolen by a friend from his girlfriend’s computer while the pair were working at home during the pandemic.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会权衡美国国债中央清算规则的下一步措施
item.description: 华尔街最高监管机构正在考虑如何缓解市场如何过渡到一项要求对冲基金、银行和其他从事美国国债交易的公司集中清算更多交易的全面规则。【原文：Wall Street’s top regulator is considering ways to ease how the market transitions to a sweeping rule requiring hedge funds, banks, and other firms trading in US Treasuries to centrally clear more of their trades.】

item.title: 与 CoreWeave 绑定的数据中心债务考验充斥市场的实力
item.description: 债务投资者对旨在为数据中心建设提供资金的最新垃圾债券交易持更加谨慎的态度。【原文：Debt investors are taking a more cautious view of the latest junk bond deal aimed at funding data center construction.】

item.title: 银行在价值 1100 亿澳元的澳大利亚大宗交易繁荣中承担巨大风险
item.description: 全球金融业竞争最激烈的角落之一正变得更加极端，因为银行家们冒着巨大的风险，要在澳大利亚利润丰厚的大宗交易中击败对手。【原文：One of the most competitive corners of global finance is becoming even more extreme as bankers take big risks to outmaneuver rivals for lucrative block trades in Australia.】

item.title: 支出法案》禁止销售多种大麻制造的 THC 饮料
item.description: 大麻提取的四氢大麻酚饮料有望成为政府支出法案的受害者，结束创纪录的长期停摆。【原文：Hemp-derived THC drinks are poised to be victims of the government spending bill ending the record-long shutdown.】

item.title: 中期选举前阿根廷通胀略有回升
item.description: 由于哈维尔-米莱伊总统的政党面临着严峻的中期选举，阿根廷上个月的物价上涨符合预期。【原文：Prices in Argentina picked up in line with expectations last month as President Javier Milei’s party faced a crunch midterm election.】

item.title: 谷歌正试图颠覆价值 4.7 亿美元的垃圾邮件工厂
item.description: 有关 "未付通行费 "文本的更多详情。【原文：More details about “unpaid tolls” texts.】

item.title: 中国如何在与美国的贸易争端中利用大豆作为武器
item.description: 大豆一直是中美贸易战的导火索，而中国是世界上最大的油籽进口国。在新收获季节开始时，东亚国家抵制美国大豆。10 月下旬，在中美两国斡旋达成更大规模的贸易协议的同时，中国的大豆订单激增，此后，中国对美国大豆的采购再次陷入停滞。【原文：Soybeans have been a flashpoint in the trade war between the US and China, the world’s largest importer of the oilseed. To begin the new harvest season, the East Asian nation boycotted American soybeans. After a flurry of orders from China in late October – which coincided with a larger trade agreement brokered by the two countries – China’s purchases of US soybeans again stalled.】
